WUSF Public Alerts System

Alerts Banner

Features and Use Cases

  • Displays all alert types currently in effect.
  • Exposes link to the weather page for more in-depth information.
  • Theming via CSS classes and variables.
  • Designed for mobile devices and larger screens.
Weather Alerts

Code to Implement

<alerts-banner area="FL" class="pas__alerts-banner">Weather Alerts</alerts-banner>

Alerts Module

Features and Use Cases

  • Displays alert type, areas affected, and event ending time.
  • Alerts are searchable by county or by type.
  • Details pane provides additional information such as impacts, severity, and recommended actions.
  • Theming via CSS classes and variables.
  • Designed for mobile devices and larger screens.

Code to Implement

<alerts-module area="FL" class="pas__alerts-module"></alerts-module>
